# didPresent(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sent to the delegate after an action sheet is presented to the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func didPresent(_ actionSheet: UIActionSheet)
```

## Parameters

- **actionSheet**: The action sheet that was displayed.

## Customizing behavior

- **willPresent(_:)**: Sent to the delegate before an action sheet is presented to the user.
- **actionSheet(_:willDismissWithButtonIndex:)**: Sent to the delegate before an action sheet is dismissed.
- **actionSheet(_:didDismissWithButtonIndex:)**: Sent to the delegate after an action sheet is dismissed from the screen.
